# Node/Express backend (server)
server/node_modules/
server/.env
server/.vscode/
server/logs/
server/dist/

# React frontend (client)
client/node_modules/
client/build/
client/.env
client/.vscode/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
logs/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# IDE/Editor specific files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Backup files (e.g., from editors)
*~
